A decent concept that should've been a small part of a larger game, but then wasn't. But it's cheap and goes on sale all the time. Co-op gameplay, lots of maps and guns, and it's constantly being expanded. A good time, for a decent price, even if it does wear thin after a while. 4/5

Not many enemy types but still very fun to kill them all, its about surviving round after round to spend your DOSH. 10/10 have spent too many hours in this game Highly recommend!

Ну какой же приятный звук при хэдшоте. Когда у зомбаков бошка разлетаеться на мелкие кусочки со звуком расколотого арбуза уроненного на пол. Это прям симфония для ушей. И их мозги медленно стекают по стенам, оставляя за собой кровавые разводы. А они все прут и прут, а ты им бошки все отщелкиваешь и отщелкиваешь. Ууууууум ЛЯПОТА.

Really fun game to play with friends. One of the best co-op survival games out there. Even has a small rpg feel since you can level up your different perks and keep getting better.
If you don't have this game, fuck you.

A very nice co-op game. It's different from left 4 dead as you stay on one map, a bit like the survival mode. You have to play against hordes of enemies spawning in waves, and at the end of each wave you go to the trader to buy new equipment. There are perks which means there is a medic, sniper, demolitionist ... which gives you some stats boost, plus you can level up those classes. The graphics are nice, but the best part is the gameplay, and especially the feeling of the weapons is just AWESOME. I would recommend that game just for how well the weapons are rendered and feel. It's great fun to play with friends. Let's not forget the soundtrack, pure heavy metal. I give this game a 9/10.

While many term it to be a zombie survival they aren't your typical zombies; rather they're more along the lines of experiments. You're set onto a map where you typically fight off 10 waves of these creations and then face the boss. A typical map will take you 30-45 minutes to finish. This means it's a highly repetitive game but with a few different ways to play it in terms of perks (class) which gives a boost to specific types of weapons. It can be enjoyable when tinkering around with mutators and mods provided you're not dead set on a having a serious game. The only real goal you have is with the achievements and with maxxing your perks out to level 6 where if you really push it can be done in as little as two or three weeks. The graphics show their age with horrid lighting where if you aim a flashlight it's only really displayed on one surface at a time. If you enjoy mindless grinds and enjoy being hit on by a girl with the looks of an 8 year old boy, you might enjoy this.
(AWESOME!)Game for the price
Money money money!  This game is fun

One of the few multiplayer games I have played for more than a few hours. Currently at 170-odd hours.

It's a quality coop game. Imagine counter strike with classes and zombies, that's basically it in a nutshell. Great game.
This game looks and plays like it was made in 1995. Fuck everything about this game. If I invented a time machine, I would not travel to 1995 so I would not play this game.

What can I say about Killing Floor? It is probably the greatest Infected/Zombie game I have ever played. You and up to a team of 6 players(Custom servers can have up to 99 players in one game) battle through 22 different maps, not including custom-made ones, with 10 waves of infestation ranging from the weak but suprisingly annoying Clot at Wave 1, through to Fleshpounds, Skrakes, Husks, Crawlers, Sirens, Bloats, Gorefasts and Stalkers, all the way to the finale with the Patriarch - a guy with a chaingun on one arm  and a rocket launcher on the other and an alien-like device coming out of his chest! This game is predominatly multiplayer as it can get quite lonley wandering the streets with a shotgun looking for infected. To make this game even better, there are 7 perks(Field Medic, Beserker, Firebug, Sharpshooter, Support Specialist, Commando and Demolition) which take a while to level up to Level 6 but it is totally worth it! Finally, there are many, many achievements which is FAB!
It is amazing that this game is still fun to play 3 years after it was released.

Even after all this time and having nearly every class maxed out, I've gotta say I still sincerely enjoy this game. It's definitely one of my favorite games. Conserve your ammo and aim for the head! The wide weapon and map selection make this a great buy, especially on sale. I found the Pyro class particularly addictive because of the eventual immunity to fire damage, fire grenades, and a decent flamethrower as a primary.
Dosh! Grab it while you can!

Отличный зомби-шутер на выживание! Очень радует что игру несколько раз в год обновляют добавляя карты и оружку, делают забавные скины зомбей и добавляют разных персонажей за которых можно играть, правда за последнее приходиться платить 50 руб.(на скидоне 15 -20). Также в игре присутствует 6 классов прокачки которые помогают более эффективно уничтожать зомбей, также снижают стоимость оружия. Единственным минусом в игре является графон а так, игруха супер! Серьёзно затягивает....

Fun classes based zombie co-op killing action, with more british sterotypes and idioms in it than a pot of tea and crumpets could have.

Don't be disheartened with how easy beginner feels, they nerf zombies to 30% damage, 50% health and give you more cash and damage resistance.

The thing I really liked is you can level up classes you're not using, for example if you're a sharpshooter, healing team mates as a SS still counts towards your medic level.

In a weird counter strike meets left 4 dead type experience this is the co-op wave defense game call of duty: zombies wishes it was.

With tonnes of maps, and servers allowing 6-8 players (with enemy counts and health scaling to player numbers)
dosh, grab it will ya can lads

One of the Best Co-op Game Ever.
Just play it.

This game is really fun, and although it seems kinda outdated with the barebones gameplay, it's a pretty fun shooting gallery-zombie like experience. There are an array of weapons to pick from and they keep adding more with each update, so there are a plethera of ways to remove the zombie threat, but unless you're on multiplayer, any difficulty higher than medium (and maybe even medium itself) becomes unnecessarily hard. The game is definitely meant for you to play with your friends, and that's where you'll get most of your fun out of this game.

6/10
Great game for killing loads of creepy infected. Plenty of blood and guts, a real fun time.

Love this game.
It combines of FPS, co-op, zombie apocalypse, shooter and blood & gore.   

This game context involves; realistic, animated guns shooting and reloading, zeds from grapping clots to raging fleshpounds, slow motion (zed time) like in the matrix and the level up to become more powerful player. 

This makes you enjoy the game with just yourself and with other players including your friends working together to survive and to give money to each other as you wish *Dosh*.

I love the custom add-ons from workshop to make it more enjoyable. For example, a custom horror map where you collect keys to escape a hotel building without getting killed by a psycho fleshpound tracking you down.

Another is driving cars around west London running down zeds but making sure to dodge the fire balls from the husks.

This game should be more recognized as Killing Floor 2 is coming out soon with better graphics, realistic guns and the interesting M.E.A.T (Massive Evisceration and Trauma) and more blood that will stay there until the end of the match.

In the end; this game has guns, lots of guns, gore & blood, dosh, zeds easy to hard and enjoyment to all who plays it.
If you don't have this game, then you have a problem. Fix that problem.

É bem tenso quando sobra apenas você e o Patriarch no final, quase impossível de ser jogado sozinho. RECOMENDADÍSSIMO, principalmente pelo fator diversão!

Fun, fast paced, and lots of custom maps means this one is replayable for a long, long time. The most fun is with a group of friends, but it's fun to play with random people as well. The in-game voice chat is kind of shoddy and lacking a lot of features, so it's recommended that you use an external VO-IP program like TeamSpeak, Vent or Mumble.
The best choice if you just want to remove your stress. I can see no other reason why people still play it.

“뭐니 뭐니 뭐니!” 게임을 해보면 무슨 뜻인지 알게 된다. [레드 오케스트라]시리즈를 제작한 [트립 와이어]의 대표작(정작 그들의 메인 게임인 레드 오케스트라 시리즈는 버그로 인해 2편에서 망했다;) 꽤 장수하는 호러(명랑 코믹) FPS 게임으로서 밀려오는 적들을 팀원들과 함께 때려잡는 맛이 일품이다. 아쉽게도 해외 서버에 의존해야만 하는 게임이고, 모딩 커뮤니티가 강력한 게임이라 한국에서 플레이하기에는 다소 적합하지 않다.

The waves increase in difficulty, until you finally reach the boss at the end of the session. Takes some getting used to, but regardless, it's fun. Go play it.

Excelente juego survival/horror en el que la pesadilla de monstruos acechandote en 180º te pondrá de los nervios. Armas de todo tipo y mejoras para tu personaje. En mi opinión uno de los mejores juegos de PESADILLA que hayan sacado con un toque distinto al L4D. Juega con tu equipo o muere. Ya que ni siendo un megapro podrás sobrevivir solo. 

Cosas que te ofrece el juego:

- Escenarios muy bien logrados: Granjas, ciudades, sotanos, etc. bien elaborados para que el desafio no decepcione en ningún aspecto.
- Monstruos: Una gran variedad de abominaciones te espera. Sobrevive 10 oleadas y enfréntate al Jefe Final, si consigues derrotarlo ganas, si no, mueres.
- Armas y herammientas: Rifles, ballestas, lanzallamas y una gran variedad de armas no te van a faltar para que mates con una sonrisa en la cara. Las herramientas como el soldador, te permitirán cerrar puertas durante un tiempo, lo cual es una enorme ventaja contra las hordas.
- Perks: Médico, Asalto, Apoyo, etc. Mejoras para tu personaje como para el armamento que lleves según vayas acabando con esos hijos de perra.
- Sistema Táctico: Antes de que comience la siguiente oleada, decide con tu grupo el mejor lugar en el que atacar y defender.
- Respawn de armas, armaduras y otros: Esto ayuda mucho, sin duda alguna.
- Música: El heavy se pone de moda en K.F. y vas a escucharlo mientras le revientas la cabeza a esos engendros.
- Gráficos: Muy adecuados para el juego. Puedes jugar hasta con la tarjeta gráfica integrada y un procesador de gama baja. El juego en éste punto es fenomenal.
- Sonido: Acojontante. Compruebalo tu mismo.


Lo que falta en el juego:

- Algunos bugs sin corregir, pero que no se notan demasiado.
- Matar en sigilo: No vas a poder.
- Carisma de los personajes bajo: Tienen carisma, pero no es lo mismo que en L4D, por ejemplo.
- Sistema de un solo jugador: Creo que no existe.
- Igualdad de condiciones de juego en grupo: Olvidate. Ganas dinero matando. Si eres un Harcore Gamer, tus compañeros se quedarán con las migajas.

this game ROCKS! its scary as hell but super fun and never gets old. you can choose what you wanna do, heal your team? snipe with pistols and rifles? blow their faces off with a shotgun? or a little rapid fire from automatic weapons. they have it all i highly encourage you to play this game. :)
